name: @iot/ui5-errorhandler
description: Handle UI5- and OData-messages and display them in MessagePopover/-Box

scripts.build: ui5 build --include-task=generateCachebusterInfo --clean-dest && rimraf npm_dist && mkdir npm_dist && mkdir npm_dist\src && mkdir npm_dist\src\errorhandler && cp -a dist\. npm_dist\src\errorhandler && cp {ui5.yaml,.npmrc,package.json,xs-app.json} npm_dist && cp xs-app.json dist
scripts.release: npm version patch && node update-versions && npm run build && cd npm_dist && npm publish
